title: Dead Eels Gang
content:
#faction/underworld
Known for piracy along the canals. Rival the Hatters.

title: Eyeless
content:
#faction/underworld
Notorious criminal organization obsessed with the occult.

title: Factions
content: Factions are various groups which vie for control of Karnaca. tag:faction

title: Grand Guard
content:
#faction/institution
The military and city watch of Karnaca.

title: Hatters
content:
#faction/underworld
Small group connected to a former Dunwall gang. Ingest smuggled goods from Dunwall.

title: Howlers
content: #faction/underworld Gang which sees themselves as idealists and revolutionaries trying to overthrow the corrupt Grand Guard. Rival Grand Guard. Currently at war with the Abbey of the Everyman.

title: Roaring Boys
content:
#faction/underworld
Splinter faction of the Hatters. Main source of income is shipping contraband, including weapons and equipment used by the Grand Guard.

title: Sixways Gang
content:
#faction/underworld
This is a template for a faction.This is a template for a faction.

title: The Grizzlers
content:
#faction/underworld
Street toughs who run protection rackets in the Old Quarter.

title: The Hagsmen
content: #faction/underworld Gang of smugglers and cutthroats known to dump bodies in the canal for the hagfish to dispose of.

title: Karnaca
content: #location/city #empire_of_the_isles/serkonos/karnaca The capital city of Serkonos, the southernmost island of the Empire of the Isles.

title: Serkonos
content: #location/nation #empire_of_the_isles/serkonos Serkonos is the southernmost of the four main islands of the Empire of the Isles. The capital city of Serkonos is Karnaca, on the southern coast. The isle is known for its warm, tropical climate and vast beaches. It is ruled by a Duke. The principal police force of Serkonos is the Grand Guard. Its primary cities are Karnaca, Cullero, Saggunto, and Bastillian.
